alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 9:16PM EDT until October 12 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Coffee County in southeastern Georgia... Jeff Davis County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 916 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lumber City to near Pridgen to near Ocilla, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hazlehurst, Broxton, Ambrose, Pridgen, West Green, Snipesville and Denton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
